trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> objects.
This class cannot be inherited.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref> class.
This new instance is empty, that is, it does not yet contain any <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> objects.
Adds an <xref:System.Object> that is a table mapping to the collection.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTableMapping" name="DataTableMapping" href=""></xref> object to add to the collection.
The index of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTableMapping" name="DataTableMapping" href=""></xref> object added to the collection.
The object passed in was not a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object.
Adds a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to the collection when given a source table name and a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name.
The case-sensitive name of the source table to map from.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table to map to.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object that was added to the collection.
Copies the elements of the specified <xref:System.Array> to the end of the collection.
An <xref:System.Array> of values to add to the collection.
Copies the elements of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> array to the end of the collection.
The array of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
Removes all <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> objects from the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether the given <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object exists in the collection.
An <xref:System.Object> that is the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this collection contains the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified source table name exists in the collection.
The case-sensitive source table name containing the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with this source table name; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref> to the specified array.
An <xref:System.Array> to which to copy the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref> elements.
The starting index of the array.
Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to the specified array.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> to which to copy the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref> elements.
The starting index of the array.
Gets the number of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> objects in the collection.
The number of <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataTableMapping" name="DataTableMapping" href=""></xref> objects in the collection.
Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table to find.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name.
Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.

Gets a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source table name and <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name, using the given <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>.
If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> exists in the collection, it is returned.

If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> does not exist in the collection for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following happens: |MissingMappingAction|Action taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object with the given `sourceTable` as the source table name and `dataSetTable` as the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> table name.
The created <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping> object is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|An exception is generated.
The `dataSetTable` parameter is ignored.| |`Ignore`|Gets `null`.
The `dataSetTable` parameter is ignored.|
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref> collection to search.
The case-sensitive name of the mapped source table.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the mapped <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> values.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object.
The mappingAction parameter was set to , and no mapping was specified.
Gets the location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object within the collection.
An <xref:System.Object> that is the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to find.
The zero-based location of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object within the collection.
Gets the location of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified source table name.
The case-sensitive name of the source table.
The zero-based location of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified source table name.
Gets the location of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name.
The name, which is not case-sensitive, of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref> table to find.

The zero-based location of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the given <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name, or -1 if the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object does not exist in the collection.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to insert.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to insert.
Inserts a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to insert.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to insert.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to return.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object at the specified index.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified source table name.
The case-sensitive name of the source table.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified source table name.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to remove.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object from the collection.
The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to remove.
The object specified was not a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object.
The object specified is not in the collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object located at the specified index from the collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object to remove.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object does not exist with the specified index.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object with the specified source table name from the collection.
The case-sensitive source table name to find.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> object does not exist with the specified source table name.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe).
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Collections.IList> is read-only.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IList> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets an item from the collection at a specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.System.Collections.IList.Item%2A>.
The zero-based index of the item to get or set.
The element at the specified index.
Adds a table mapping to the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection.Add%2A>.
The case-sensitive name of the source table.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table.
A reference to the newly-mapped <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> object.
Gets the TableMapping object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> table name.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection.GetByDataSetTable%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref> table within the collection.
The TableMapping object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref> table name.
Gets or sets the instance of <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> with the specified <xref:System.Data.ITableMapping.SourceTable*> name.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection> interface.
For more information, see <xref:System.Data.ITableMappingCollection.Item%2A>.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""></xref> name of the <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref>.
The instance of <xref href="System.Data.ITableMapping"></xref> with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceTable" name="SourceTable" href=""></xref> name.
